name: OpenCode
short_description: Open source AI coding agent for terminal, IDE, and desktop.
description: Open source AI coding agent for terminal, IDE, and desktop. OpenCode is a self-hosted application focused on development, productivity, ai, terminal. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host OpenCode on your home server to open source ai coding agent for terminal, ide, and desktop without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use OpenCode to manage your development workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
